events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision with another car at an intersection, filing the claim promptly with all relevant initial details included.
The claim was reviewed and correctly categorized under the Auto Accident cluster due to keywords indicating a car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the vehicle collision case promptly to ensure efficient processing and customer support.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and providing preliminary instructions for next steps.
Requested additional documentation from the customer including photos of the damaged vehicle and police accident report for investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including damage photos and official police report, well before the deadline.
Internal team started the investigation into the auto accident claim, reviewing all documents and contacting involved parties for validation.
The investigation was completed with a full assessment of the collision circumstances and the extent of vehicle damage.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer reflecting repair costs and policy coverage after thorough investigation.
Customer provided positive feedback on the clear communication and fair settlement proposal provided by the claims team.
The claim was formally approved following customer's agreement to the settlement terms outlined by the insurance company.
Payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account covering the agreed settlement amount for the vehicle repairs.
The claim case was formally closed after payment issuance, with confirmation sent to customer summarizing all completed steps.
